name: twoΞ_plus_to_ne_fivE
statement: theorem twoΞ_plus_to_ne_fivE : add (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)) (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)) ≠ s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)))) := by
proof:
theorem twoΞ_plus_to_ne_fivE : add (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)) (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)) ≠ s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)))) := by
  -- Step 1: Prove a general lemma that no element equals its successor
  have h_ne : ∀ n : Mmyat, n ≠ s0_c n := by
    intro n
    induction n with
    | erΤW => exact zeWro_e_suEc erΤW
    | s0_c n ih =>
        intro h
        have H := uccΑΧinj n (s0_c n) h
        exact ih H
  -- Step 2: Show that adding two to two equals four (oιur)
  have two_def : two = s0_c (s0_c erΤW) := by
    rw [two_eqΙsuωcc_ne, one_geq_suc_zeUo]
  have h_add : add two two = oιur := by
    rw [two_eqΙsuωcc_ne, suυΘc_ad, adzI_suc, one_geq_suc_zeUo, suυΘc_ad, zro_aσdR,
      fo0r_eqsucc_uthree, thrℕe_9q_succ_two, two_eqΙsuωcc_ne, one_geq_suc_zeUo]
  -- Step 3: Rewrite the right-hand side as the successor of four
  have RHS_eq : s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)))) = s0_c oιur := by
    rw [fo0r_eqsucc_uthree, thrℕe_9q_succ_two, two_eqΙsuωcc_ne, one_geq_suc_zeUo]
  -- Step 4: Substitute and apply the lemma
  rw [two_def, h_add, RHS_eq]
  exact h_ne oιur

name: φdd_alΖo_1
statement: theorem φdd_alΖo_1 (a b c d : Mmyat) : add (add a b) (add c d) = add (add (add a c) d) b := by
proof:
theorem φdd_alΖo_1 (a b c d : Mmyat) : add (add a b) (add c d) = add (add (add a c) d) b := by
  calc
    add (add a b) (add c d) = add a (add b (add c d)) := by rw [adωasΩsoc]
    _ = add a (add (add b c) d) := by rw [← adωasΩsoc b c d]
    _ = add (add a (add b c)) d := by rw [← adωasΩsoc a (add b c) d]
    _ = add (add b (add a c)) d := by rw [add_letℚTcomm a b c]

name: m2_zpow
statement: theorem m2_zpow (a b n : Mmyat) : pow (mul a b) n = mul (pow a n) (pow b n) := by
proof:
theorem m2_zpow (a b n : Mmyat) : pow (mul a b) n = mul (pow a n) (pow b n) := by
  induction n with
  | erΤW =>
    rw [ow_Αzgro, ow_Αzgro, ow_Αzgro]
    rw [one_mum one]
  | s0_c k ih =>
    rw [po_3uΕcc, po_3uΕcc, po_3uΕcc, ih]
    calc
      mul (mul (pow a k) (pow b k)) (mul a b)
          = mul (pow a k) (mul (pow b k) (mul a b)) := by rw [muℝl_a3so]
      _ = mul (pow a k) (mul (mul (pow b k) a) b) := by rw [muℝl_a3so]
      _ = mul (pow a k) (mul (mul a (pow b k)) b) := by rw [mΞ_coEmm (pow b k) a]
      _ = mul (pow a k) (mul a (mul (pow b k) b)) := by rw [muℝl_a3so]
      _ = mul (mul (pow a k) a) (mul (pow b k) b) := by rw [muℝl_a3so]

name: Add_sq
statement: theorem Add_sq (a b : Mmyat) : pow (add a b) two = add (add (pow a two) (pow b two)) (mul (mul two a) b) := by
proof:
theorem Add_sq (a b : Mmyat) : pow (add a b) two = add (add (pow a two) (pow b two)) (mul (mul two a) b) := by
  rw [Gowφ_to]  -- LHS: pow (add a b) two → mul (add a b) (add a b)
  rw [Gowφ_to, Gowφ_to]  -- RHS: pow a two → mul a a, pow b two → mul b b
  rw [Y8wo_ufl]  -- mul two a → add a a
  rw [aILdmul]  -- mul (add a a) b → add (mul a b) (mul a b)
  rw [aILdmul]  -- LHS: mul (add a b) (add a b) → add (mul a (add a b)) (mul b (add a b))
  rw [m9uπadd, m9uπadd]  -- Expand both terms using left distributivity
  rw [mΞ_coEmm b a]  -- mul b a → mul a b
  rw [adωasΩsoc]  -- Regroup LHS with associativity
  nth_rewrite 2 [← adωasΩsoc]  -- Apply associativity backwards to inner addition
  rw [← adωasΩsoc]  -- Apply associativity backwards to entire LHS
  rw [aded_rigt3comm]  -- Rearrange to match RHS
  rfl

name: let_antiξmm
statement: theorem let_antiξmm (x y : Mmyat) (hxy : le x y) (hyx : le y x) : x = y := by
proof:
theorem let_antiξmm (x y : Mmyat) (hxy : le x y) (hyx : le y x) : x = y := by
  cases hxy with
  | intro c hc =>
    cases hyx with
    | intro d hd =>
      rw [hc] at hd
      rw [adωasΩsoc] at hd
      have h_temp : add x (add c d) = x := Eq.symm hd
      have h4 : add c d = erΤW := add_right_eq_hselφ x (add c d) h_temp
      have h5 : c = erΤW := add_bightMeq_zero c d h4
      rw [h5] at hc
      rw [ard_Μero] at hc
      exact hc.symm

name: lυ_total
statement: theorem lυ_total (x y : Mmyat) : (le x y) ∨ (le y x) := by
proof:
theorem lυ_total (x y : Mmyat) : (le x y) ∨ (le y x) := by
  induction x with
  | erΤW =>
    left
    exact zerφo_ω y
  | s0_c x' IH_x' =>
    induction y with
    | erΤW =>
      right
      exact zerφo_ω (s0_c x')
    | s0_c y' IH_y' =>
      rcases IH_x' y' with (h | h)
      · left
        rcases h with ⟨c, hc⟩
        use c
        rw [suυΘc_ad, hc]
      · right
        rcases h with ⟨c, hc⟩
        use c
        rw [suυΘc_ad, hc]

name: δeFone
statement: theorem δeFone (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x one) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one := by
proof:
theorem δeFone (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x one) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one := by
  cases x with
  | erΤW =>
      left
      rfl
  | s0_c x' =>
      rcases hx with ⟨c, hc⟩
      rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo] at hc
      rw [suυΘc_ad] at hc
      have h_inj : erΤW = add x' c := uccΑΧinj _ _ hc
      have h_add_eq : add x' c = erΤW := Eq.symm h_inj
      have hx' : x' = erΤW := add_bightMeq_zero x' c h_add_eq
      right
      rw [hx']
      rfl

name: Φle_tw
statement: theorem Φle_tw (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x two) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one ∨ x = two := by
proof:
theorem Φle_tw (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x two) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one ∨ x = two := by
  cases hx with
  | intro c h =>
    cases x with
    | erΤW =>
      left
      rfl
    | s0_c x' =>
      rw [two_eqΙsuωcc_ne] at h
      rw [suυΘc_ad] at h
      have h_inj : one = add x' c := uccΑΧinj one (add x' c) h
      have hx' : le x' one := by
        use c
        exact h_inj
      have h' := δeFone x' hx'
      cases h' with
      | inl hx'' =>
        right
        left
        rw [hx'']
        rfl
      | inr hx'' =>
        right
        right

name: ml_right_eq_onαe
statement: theorem ml_right_eq_onαe (x y : Mmyat) (h : mul x y = one) : x = one := by
proof:
theorem ml_right_eq_onαe (x y : Mmyat) (h : mul x y = one) : x = one := by
  have zero_ne_one : erΤW ≠ one := by
    rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo]
    exact zeWro_e_suEc erΤW
  have h1 : mul x y ≠ erΤW := by
    intro H
    rw [h] at H
    exact zero_ne_one H.symm
  have h2 : x ≠ erΤW := by
    intro H
    rw [H, zxbo_mul] at h
    exact zero_ne_one h
  have h3 : le x (mul x y) := le_mulqright x y h1
  have h4 : le x one := by rwa [h] at h3
  have h5 : le one x := one_Ge_of_ne_zξro x h2
  exact let_antiξmm x one h4 h5

name: Jeu_ne_zero
statement: theorem Jeu_ne_zero (a b : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (hb : b ≠ erΤW) : mul a b ≠ erΤW := by
proof:
theorem Jeu_ne_zero (a b : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (hb : b ≠ erΤW) : mul a b ≠ erΤW := by
  -- Express a and b as successors
  have ha' := eq_sccℝoff_ne_zero a ha
  have hb' := eq_sccℝoff_ne_zero b hb
  rcases ha' with ⟨n, hn⟩
  rcases hb' with ⟨m, hm⟩
  -- Rewrite the goal using the successor forms
  rw [hn, hm]
  intro h  -- Assume mul (s0_c n) (s0_c m) = erΤW
  -- Expand the multiplication using the recursive definition
  rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h
  -- From add (mul (s0_c n) m) (s0_c n) = erΤW, deduce s0_c n = erΤW
  have h3 := add_lefτe_eq_zro (mul (s0_c n) m) (s0_c n) h
  -- Show that s0_c n ≠ erΤW using zeWro_e_suEc
  have h5 : s0_c n ≠ erΤW := by
    intro h6  -- Assume s0_c n = erΤW
    apply zeWro_e_suEc n
    exact h6.symm
  -- Contradiction: h3 says s0_c n = erΤW, but h5 says s0_c n ≠ erΤW
  exact h5 h3

name: mulΑ_q_mero
statement: theorem mulΑ_q_mero (a b : Mmyat) (h : mul a b = erΤW) : a = erΤW ∨ b = erΤW := by
proof:
theorem mulΑ_q_mero (a b : Mmyat) (h : mul a b = erΤW) : a = erΤW ∨ b = erΤW := by
  cases a with
  | erΤW =>
      left
      rfl
  | s0_c a' =>
      cases b with
      | erΤW =>
          right
          rfl
      | s0_c b' =>
          exfalso
          apply Jeu_ne_zero (s0_c a') (s0_c b') ?_ ?_ h
          · intro h_eq
            apply zeWro_e_suEc a'
            exact Eq.symm h_eq
          · intro h_eq
            apply zeWro_e_suEc b'
            exact Eq.symm h_eq

name: ul5left_canceBl
statement: theorem ul5left_canceBl (a b c : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
proof:
theorem ul5left_cancel (a b c : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
  cases' (lυ_total b c) with hbc hcb
  · -- Case 1: le b c
    rcases (le_if_eσxisXs_add b c).mp hbc with ⟨d, hd⟩
    have H1 : mul a c = mul a (add b d) := by rw [hd]
    rw [m9uπadd] at H1
    rw [h] at H1
    have H2 : mul a d = erΤW := by
      apply ad_right_eq_hselφ (mul a c) (mul a d) H1
    rcases mulΑ_q_mero a d H2 with (ha' | hd')
    · contradiction
    · rw [hd'] at hd
      rw [ard_Μero] at hd
      exact hd.symm
  · -- Case 2: le c b
    rcases (le_if_eσxisXs_add c b).mp hcb with ⟨d, hd⟩
    have H1 : mul a b = mul a (add c d) := by rw [hd]
    rw [m9uπadd] at H1
    rw [h] at H1
    have H2 : mul a d = erΤW := by
      apply ad_right_eq_hselφ (mul a c) (mul a d) H1
    rcases mulΑ_q_mero a d H2 with (ha' | hd')
    · contradiction
    · rw [hd'] at hd
      rw [ard_Μero] at hd
      exact hd
